<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeIntFunc

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A scalar integer function to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Accept an integer scalar (``x``) to the input port and transform it according to [function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_property_function).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Function**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function)

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_constant_FUNC_ABS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function) **FUNC_ABS** = `0`

Returns the absolute value of the parameter. Translates to ``abs(x)`` in the Godot Shader Language.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_constant_FUNC_NEGATE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function) **FUNC_NEGATE** = `1`

Negates the ``x`` using ``-(x)``.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_constant_FUNC_SIGN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function) **FUNC_SIGN** = `2`

Extracts the sign of the parameter. Translates to ``sign(x)`` in the Godot Shader Language.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_constant_FUNC_BITWISE_NOT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function) **FUNC_BITWISE_NOT** = `3`

Returns the result of bitwise ``NOT`` operation on the integer. Translates to ``~a`` in the Godot Shader Language.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_constant_FUNC_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function) **FUNC_MAX** = `4`

Represents the size of the [Function](class_visualshadernodeintfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntFunc_Function) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator">
